text: Esther Williams (August 8, 1921 â€“ June 6, 2013) was an American former swimmer and actress. She starred in movies in her career. She later became a businesswoman. ==Early life== She was born in Inglewood, California. ==Death== Williams died in her sleep on June 6, 2013 in her Los Angeles home. ==Other websites== * * Official Esther Williams website * The Golden Years * Esther Williams Swimming Pools website * The Shelf: Review of The Esther Williams Collection, vol. 1 * Photographs of Esther Williams * Vaudeville theater named in honor of Esther Williams Category:Actors from Inglewood, California Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles County, California Category:American movie actors Category:American swimmers Category:Sportspeople from Los Angeles County, California Category:1921 births Category:2013 deaths
title: Esther Williams
